Articles.Content:
I'm sure everyones talking about it, but id like a dedicated thread tracking mod compatibility. So who has ventured forth? I'm at work so I can't check for myself.

Novapunch

KW

KAS

Engineering redux

B9

Anyone know how these mods fared? Also just post any mod. If the mod works/doesn't for .21 let us know.
I want to know if FAR works. That's the only thing I'm personally concerned about. I'm at work now as well so I can't check...
It's probably best that this be in the Add-ons forum, like the last time, for visibility.
could the TS updates hi first post so that everyone doesnt need to travel through pages to llok for answers
add-on support forum would be a better place, there's probably a topic there already

I figured this forum moves faster and more people post here so id get more information. What of sub assembly as well?

Lol it figures there's a mirror topic in addon affairs. It's moving fast enough over there. So just delete this one I guess. My apologies.

Edited July 24, 2013 by Motokid600
MJ doesnt work at the moment. it crashes ksp for me.

Tried out Alarm clock - it loads OK but switching between alarm types breaks the UI.

I can also confirm - Mechjeb doesnt attach to anything.
Mission Controller doesn't work, icon shows but I got a blank window when I opened it.
mechjeb 1.9 doesn't work right, the autopilot features do nothing. The information tabs do work correctly..
ive made a thread that has what people have posted check it out for info on the mods
FAR has been updated to work, but I'm getting mixed results. The panels aren't coming up anymore on probe based rockets. (This is a regression of a previous bug.)

Engineer does work however when I selected a target on the rendezvous tab the entire UI disappeared and I was left with a single featureless grey bar. After this engineer was totally unavailable and useless for that flight.
for me, SteamGauges doesnt work...i was soo happy with the radar altimeter
